p: It should be noted that PP-PSMs have shown some limitations. For example, they are generally insoluble in organic solvents owing to their high degree of cross-linking. This feature, in particular, greatly complicates the characterization of the polymers [ 131]. It was also observed that PP-PSMs are highly susceptible to changes brought by the chemical composition of the medium (e.g., the aqueous solution and body fluid) that may affect their operation in some applications [ 174].
